mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM outbound_plan WHERE status = '출고예정') AS outboundSchedule, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM outbound_plan WHERE status = '출고지시') AS outboundAssign, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM outbound_plan WHERE status = '출고피킹') AS outboundPicking, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM outbound_plan WHERE status = '출고패킹') AS outboundPacking, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM outbound_plan op join outbound o on op.outbound_plan_id = o.outbound_plan_id WHERE op.status = '출하상차' AND DATE(o.outbound_loading_date) = CURDATE()) AS outboundLoading

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inbound WHERE inbound_status = '입하예정') AS inboundSchedule, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inbound WHERE inbound_status = '입하검사') AS inboundCheck, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inbound WHERE inbound_status = '입고적치' AND DATE(put_away_date) = CURDATE()) AS inboundPutAway
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE is_approved = true) AS approved, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE is_approved = false) AS notApproved
